title: V. Himark (USA), Inc. Expands its Cactus Specialty Tape Brand by Signing an Exclusive Distribution Deal with IPG
text:
The joint agreement provides Cactus brand customers with access to IPG regionally based distribution, conversion, sales, and technical resources
Los Angeles, CA; Montreal, Quebec; Sarasota, FL (PRWEB) October 26, 2015
V. Himark (USA), Inc. , a leading manufacturer of the Cactus® brand specialty double-sided adhesive tapes and a wholly owned subsidiary of V. Himark Technology Ltd., announced today it has entered into an exclusive distribution agreement with Intertape Polymer Group® Inc . (TSX:ITP) (IPG®), a leading manufacturer of industrial tapes and films.
The agreement specifies geographies within North America where IPG will have sole distributor rights as well as marketing rights to Cactus branded industrial tape products for converting and distribution beginning November 2, 2015.
“We are pleased to enter into this win/win/win relationship with IPG,” said Charlie Huang, President of V. Himark (USA), Inc. “This is a great opportunity for both companies to improve top line revenue by providing more local attention and resources to expand our customers’ application of Cactus branded products and to help them reduce their operating costs.”
“IPG’s distribution partners should benefit greatly from this agreement,” stated Dean Blockowitz, IPG’s Vice President of Industrial Sales. “Our customers will now have access to a larger selection of products. This broader IPG portfolio will help our distribution partners to drive down their lead times and inventory costs.”
About IPG
Intertape Polymer Group Inc. is a recognized leader in the development, manufacture and sale of a variety of paper and film based pressure-sensitive and water-activated tapes, polyethylene and specialized polyolefin films, woven coated fabrics and complementary packaging systems for industrial and retail use. Headquartered in Montreal, Quebec and Sarasota, Florida, the Company employs approximately 1,950 employees with operations in 16 locations, including 11 manufacturing facilities in North America and one in Europe. For more information about IPG, visit http://www.itape.com .
About Cactus Tape
V. Himark (USA) Inc. is a leading manufacturer of Cactus branded specialty double-sided adhesive tapes, and a wholly owned subsidiary of V. Himark Technology Company, Ltd. V. Himark (USA ) is headquartered in Los Angeles, California and serves distributors, converters, and resellers in various markets in North America & Latin America including converting, window fenestration, foam fabrication, electronic manufacturing, and P.O.P. signs. The company is ISO-9001 certified and many products are also certified by the American Architectural Manufacturers Association (AAMA) and UL Listed. With the cooperation of partners and the company’s internal research & development team, V. Himark has strived for close to three decades to continuously improve its product offerings and develop new specialty double-sided tape products to meet customers’ needs. Cactus. Bonding the World. For further information, please visit http://www.cactustape.com . For sales related questions about Cactus double-coated and transfer tapes or for samples contact 626-305-5766 or send an email to sales@cactustape.com.
